links.*: The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''KARAK''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "sharp fang, spike, tooth".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 362 (root appearing as "KARAK-")</ref>

A rejected version read: "KARAK- tooth, spike, peak. Q ''karka''".<ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 19</ref>

==Derivatives<ref name=LR/>==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[karakse]]''; ''[[karka]]'' ("tooth"); ''[[karkane]]'' ("row of teeth")

*[[Noldorin]]: ''[[carag]]'' ("spike, tooth of rock"); ''[[carch]]'' ("tooth, fang")

{{references}}
